definition: to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)

sentences.english: Zhang assured that the average viewer's taste has not stooped to a new low.
sentences.chinese: 张志华确信观众不会奉迎新生的亚文化。

sentences.english: Being anxious to please him, I bought him a nice present.
sentences.chinese: 因为我想奉迎他，我给他买了一件好礼物。

sentences.english: We welcome all the guests here.
They colluded into a political clique despised by all and respected by none.
sentences.chinese: 他们结成了一个即被藐视又不被奉迎的政治集团。

definition: to fawn on/to ingratiate oneself/(literary) to meet face to face
to fawn on/to kiss up to
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
